A [collection of programs](https://aefarrell.github.io/picomite_library/) written in PicoMite BASIC for the [PicoCalc](https://www.clockworkpi.com/picocalc).

The programs are organized into the following categories:

- `math\` BASIC code for doing math
- `art\` BASIC code for generating cool visualizations and art
- `utils\` useful utilities
- `toys\` little toy programs
